info.name: REST API's RESTful from 0 with Java, Spring Boot, Kubernetes and Docker
info.description: REST API's RESTful from 0 with Java, Spring Boot, Kubernetes and Docker

request.description: Find a specific person by your ID
Deletes a specific person by their ID
Updates a person's information by passing in a JSON, XML or YML representation of the updated person.
Adds a new person by passing in a JSON, XML or YML representation of the person.
Find a specific book by your ID
Deletes a specific book by their ID
Updates a book's information by passing in a JSON, XML or YML representation of the updated book.
Adds a new book by passing in a JSON, XML or YML representation of the book.
